select * from v_point where 1 = 1 and status = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and merchant_id = #{merchantId}
order by ${orderByField} ASC
order by ${orderByField} DESC
order by create_time DESC

select pt.member_id AS memberId, pt.in_out, m.points As totalPoints, pt.point AS point, pt.create_time AS createTime, pt.trade_type AS tradeType from v_point_trade pt LEFT JOIN v_member m ON m.id =pt.member_id where pt.status = 1 AND m.`status`=1 AND m.open_id=#{openId} ORDER BY pt.id DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM v_point WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND `status` = 1;
